message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be of great value to your company. I understand its worth to you is significant, and I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. My asking price for the product is $1,200,000.  This represents a substantial discount from its true value to you, while still ensuring I receive a fair price. I'm confident this offer is in your best interest, and I'm open to discussing it further.
